item.title: How to make the attacker faster?
item.dc:creator: @lmfaoown lmfaoown
item.description:
@lmfaoown wrote:

I’m Trying to get my auto fighter to click FASTER, but it still goes the same pace, anyone know any ideas on how to make it faster? heres the code.

wait (100);
           if (FindBitmap (Attack, x, y)) then
           begin
                ClickMouse (x+2, y+2, True);
                wait (350);
                writeln (Monster+' Found, Attempting to Attack it.');
                repeat
                      f:= GetFightMode;
                      i:= i + 1;
                      wait (50);
                until (i = 100) or (f > 0) or
                      (IsTextAt (7, 304, 'I can t get close'));
           end;

Read full topic
item.source: How to make the attacker faster?
